chunks.text:
From: Faces-U Walk-Jeddah <uwalkjeddah@faces.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 20, 2025 2:54:45 PM
To: Ahmed Al-Qarafi <Ahmed.Alqarafi@chalhoub.com>; Lujain Khodari <Lujain.Khodari@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Fw: Reminder – Upcoming Insurance Policy Renewal for Faces Store – U Walk, Jeddah 
 


احصل على Outlook لـ iOS <https://aka.ms/o0ukef> 
________________________________

من: Mohammed Moghamsi <mohammed.moghamsi@cenomi.com>
‏‏تم الإرسال: Wednesday, August 20, 2025 2:36:54 PM
إلى: Faces-U Walk-Jeddah <uwalkjeddah@faces.com>
نسخة: Salahuddin Alzahrani <salahuddin.alzahrani@cenomi.com>; Basil Abbar <basil.abbar@cenomi.com>; UWJ-OPERATION- TEAM <uwj-operation-team@cenomi.com>
‏‏الموضوع: Reminder – Upcoming Insurance Policy Renewal for Faces Store – U Walk, Jeddah 
 
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن
Greetings,


This is a kind reminder that the insurance policy for Faces Store located at U Walk, Jeddah will expire on 23 September 2025.

To ensure uninterrupted coverage, we kindly request you to initiate the renewal of the policy with All Risks Coverage at the earliest possible date.

We would also be grateful if you could share with us a copy of the renewed policy once it has been issued.

Thank you for your continued cooperation.




 
Best Regards,

 

Mohammed Moghamsi
